forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. About one inch of snow expected.
